attributes.action: give us all 2 months of pay holyday by law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For those living in Britain life is stressful by default, and present economic conditions have worsened this situation. We ask the Prime Minister to pass a new law that guarantees 2 months of paid holydays for every resident of the United Kingdom. Where the employer cannot afford covering for the whole period of holydays, than the government must bail out the employee and guarantee his holiday.
